name: RemoveMarketingEvents
description:
Delete multiple HubSpot marketing events by specific IDs.

This tool deletes multiple HubSpot marketing events based on provided external account, event, and app IDs. It is used to remove events created by the calling app, ensuring events from other apps remain unaffected.

parameters.name: event_deletion_requests
parameters.description: A JSON array containing objects with 'externalAccountId', 'externalEventId', and 'appId'. These objects specify the marketing events to delete.

externalAccountId.description: The accountId that is associated with this marketing event in the external event application.

externalEventId.description: The id of the marketing event in the external event application.

appId.description: The id of the application that created the marketing event in HubSpot.

metadata.description: Arcade Starter tools for LLMs to interact directly with the low-level Hubspot Marketing API

externalAccountId.description: The accountId that is associated with this marketing event in the external event application.

externalEventId.description: The id of the marketing event in the external event application.

appId.description: The id of the application that created the marketing event in HubSpot.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
